item.title: Install ROS and OpenCV in Raspberry Pi
item.description: This instruction covers the installation of ROS Kinetic (Robot Operating System) and OpenCV-3.3.1 on the Raspberry Pi 2 or 3 with Raspbian Stretch.

ZC’s Blog This blog is to record my tech sharing and interest. I am currently working on Computer Vision / Machine Vision / Robotics. Passionate about Software Engineering and Machine Learning / AI. Studied and work in Singapore, graduated from Nanyang Technological University. Come from a beautiful coastal city in ShanDong Province, China. - July 2018 Updated
